name: Endless Weakness
description:
A game where you are a small boy who fights slimes to survive, the game has 25 waves and if you want to buy items from the shop you will pay the price with your blood instead.

- New Update 1.1 !!

1- Added a help menu to tell you how to play.

2- Made the game easier by:

    - Made the player deal damage from a greater distance.

    - Made the heart spawn more frequently.

3- Fixed bugs!.
